answers.1: Hercules greatly desired to make amends for such a great crime
answers.2: Therefore He decided to go to the Delphic oracle
answers.3: Therefore he decided to go to the Delphic oracle; for this oracle was the most visited of all
answers.5: In this Temple was sitting a certain woman named Pythia
answers.6: In this Temple was sitting a certain woman named Pythia and she was giving them advice
answers.7: In this Temple was sitting a certain woman named Pythia and she used to give advice to those who came to the oracle
answers.8: This woman was taught by Apollo himself
answers.10: Hercules therefore, who worshiped Apollo especially, came to this place
